name: The Magistrate
flavorText: The most powerful of wizards will find themselves richly rewarded by their studies. This hat is for those who like to display their power in a more elegant fashion.
flavorTextHtml: The most powerful of wizards will find themselves richly rewarded by their studies. This hat is for those who like to display their power in a more elegant fashion.

secondary.textHtml: Your Hydras now periodically cast Frost Nova and deal 257% increased damage. [250 - 300]%
